quotes.quote: You can close your eyes to the things you don't want to see, but you can't close your heart to the things you don't want to feel.
quotes.author: Chester Bennington

quotes.quote: Just don't do anything to yourself.
quotes.author: Verča

quotes.quote: Music is the strongest form of magic.
quotes.author: Marilyn Manson

quotes.quote: If you love two people at the same time, choose the second. Because if you really loved the first one, you wouldn't have fallen for the second.
quotes.author: Johnny Depp

quotes.quote: Music touches us emotionally, where words alone can't.
quotes.author: Johnny Depp

quotes.quote: Lion should'n care about the opinion of sheeps
quotes.author: Tywin Lannister

quotes.quote: You first have to be your own hero to be hero for someone else.
quotes.author: Bára

quotes.quote: Ti co ví jak chutná pindík, ví i kolik stojí.
quotes.author: Robin Bobeš Trnčák
